about.headerTitle: We are committed to making fitness brand visible through fantastic, high quality, yet cost-effective shaker bottles & accessories.
about.title: We offer high-grade promotional articles such as shaker bottles, pill organizers, custom-designed fitness apparel and bags, and other similar merchandize at incredibly competitive rates.
about.description: We match any logo PMS color according to the client's requirement, including matching the lid color with the strainer. Operating from Shanghai, China, Shakerfactory has a base in Switzerland as well, which provides the infrastructure needed to ensure the quality production of articles and their delivery on time.
